text: The University of Indianapolis (UIndy) is a private university working together with the United Methodist Church in Indianapolis, Indiana. It has Associate, Bachelor's, Master's, and Doctoral degrees. It was made in 1902 as Indiana Central University and was changed and more known as Indiana Central College from 1921 to 1975. The name was changed to University of Indianapolis in 1986. == References == Category:Colleges and universities in Indiana Category:Indianapolis
title: University of Indianapolis
